sx.blah.discord.api

Interface IDiscordClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscordClientImpl

    public interface IDiscordClient
    Represents the main discord api

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  IDiscordClient.Image
      Represents an avatar image.

      • getDispatcher

        EventDispatcher getDispatcher()
        Gets the EventDispatcher instance for this client. Use this to handle events.
        Returns:
        The event dispatcher instance.

      • getToken

        Gets the authorization token for this client.
        Returns:
        The authorization token.

    throws IOException,
           URISyntaxException

        IOException

      • sendMessage

        @Deprecated
Message sendMessage(String content,
                                String channelID)
                         throws IOException
        Deprecated. Use Channel.sendMessage(String)
        Sends a message to the desired channel.
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the message.
        channelID - The channel id of the channel to receive the message.
        Returns:
        The message object representing the sent message
        Throws:
        IOException

      • editMessage

        @Deprecated
Message editMessage(String content,
                                String messageID,
                                String channelID)
        Deprecated. Use Message.edit(String)
        Edits a message. NOTE: Discord only supports editing YOUR OWN messages!
        Parameters:
        content - The new content for the message to contain.
        messageID - The message id of the message to edit.
        channelID - The channel id of the channel the message belongs to.
        Returns:
        The new message.

        Parameters:

      • changeAccountInfo

        void changeAccountInfo(String username,
                       String email,
                       String password,
                       IDiscordClient.Image avatar)
                throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                       URISyntaxException
        FIXME: Fix this because it's fucking stupid. Allows you to change the info on your bot. Any fields you don't want to change should be left as an empty string ("") or null.
        Parameters:
        username - Username (if you want to change it).
        email - Email (if you want to change it)
        password - Password (if you want to change it).
        avatar - Image data for the bot's avatar, IDiscordClient.Image
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        URISyntaxException

      • updatePresence

        void updatePresence(boolean isIdle,
                    Optional<String> game)
        Updates the bot's presence.
        Parameters:
        isIdle - If true, the bot will be "idle", otherwise the bot will be "online".
        game - The optional name of the game the bot is playing. If empty, the bot simply won't be playing a game.

      • isReady

        boolean isReady()
        Checks if the api is ready to be interacted with (if it is logged in).
        Returns:
        True if ready, false if otherwise.

      • toggleTypingStatus

        @Deprecated
void toggleTypingStatus(String channelID)
        Deprecated. Use Channel.toggleTypingStatus()
        Toggles whether the bot is "typing".
        Parameters:
        channelID - The channel to maintain the typing status to.

      • getTypingStatus

        @Deprecated
boolean getTypingStatus(String channelID)
        Deprecated. Use Channel.getTypingStatus()
        Gets whether the bot is "typing".
        Parameters:
        channelID - The channel to get the typing status for for this bot.
        Returns:
        True if the bot is typing, false if otherwise.

      • createInvite

        @Deprecated
Invite createInvite(int maxAge,
                                int maxUses,
                                boolean temporary,
                                boolean useXkcdPass,
                                String channelID)
        Deprecated. Use Channel.createInvite(int, int, boolean, boolean)
        Generates an invite for this channel.
        Parameters:
        maxAge - How long the invite should be valid, setting it to 0 makes it last forever.
        maxUses - The maximum uses for the invite, setting it to 0 makes the invite have unlimited uses.
        temporary - Whether users admitted with this invite are temporary.
        useXkcdPass - Whether to generate a human-readable code, maxAge cannot be 0 for this to work.
        channelID - The channel to get the invite for.
        Returns:
        The newly generated invite.

      • getInviteForCode

        Invite getInviteForCode(String code)
        Gets the invite for a code.
        Parameters:
        code - The invite code or xkcd pass.
        Returns:
        The invite, or null if it doesn't exist.
